item.title: Business events and HTTPs endpoint
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide to setting up Business Events with HTTPS endpoints in Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations using Azure Functions, AAD app registration, and Key Vault for secure webhook integration.
